title: 怎么用summon指令生成物品
author: Dear丶小若
txt_content: 怎么用summon生成一个物品在地上？？？？？？？

replies.author: LCSDB
replies.txt_content:
一步一步来，先召唤一个金镐子，第一个为相对坐标，第二个为绝对坐标
/summon Item ~ ~1 ~ {Item:{Count:1,id:golden_pickaxe}}复制代码/summon Item X坐标 Y坐标 Z坐标 {Item:{Count:1,id:golden_pickaxe}}复制代码然后你可以尝试加一些东西，例如下方，镐子失去30耐久（绝对坐标的指令就不发了，你懂得）
/summon Item ~ ~1 ~ {Item:{Count:1,id:golden_pickaxe,Damage:30}}复制代码然后你可以加上一些附魔属性（第一个）或是加上自定义属性（第二个）
/summon Item ~ ~1 ~ {Item:{Count:1,id:golden_pickaxe,Damage:30,tag:{ench:[{id:35,lvl:3000},{id:32,lvl:3000}]}}}复制代码/summon Item ~ ~1 ~ {Item:{Count:1,id:golden_pickaxe,Damage:30,tag:{AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:2024174,UUIDMost:2024174,Amount:100.0,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Damage},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:9528484,UUIDMost:9528484,Amount:1,AttributeName:generic.knockbackResistance,Name:K_Resistance},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:4661428,UUIDMost:4661428,Amount:100.0,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health}],ench:[{id:35,lvl:3000},{id:32,lvl:3000}],Unbreakable:1}}}复制代码你也可以做一些类似于浮空字的效果
/summon Item ~ ~1 ~ {Item:{Count:1,id:golden_pickaxe,Damage:30,tag:{AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:8111668,UUIDMost:8111668,Amount:100.0,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Damage},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:2252939,UUIDMost:2252939,Amount:1,AttributeName:generic.knockbackResistance,Name:K_Resistance},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:4152247,UUIDMost:4152247,Amount:100.0,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health}],ench:[{id:35,lvl:3000},{id:32,lvl:3000}],Unbreakable:1}},CustomName:"迷的镐子",CustomNameVisible:true,Owner:籽岷,Age:-32768}复制代码这把镐子在召唤出来的时候拥有一个命名牌，以及只有“籽岷”玩家才可以将它捡起来，Age是它的存在时间，在这个时间内不会被游戏刷掉。
/summon Item ~ ~1 ~ {Item:{Count:1,id:golden_pickaxe},CustomName:"牢牢插在地上的镐子",CustomNameVisible:true,PickupDelay:32767,Age:-32768}复制代码现在又加了一个：pickupDelay这代表它可以用多长时间捡起，按现在的设定永远无法捡起
这是一个大杂烩，我有多无聊，反正没人看/summon Item ~ ~2 ~ {Item:{Count:1,id:diamond_pickaxe,tag:{display:{Name:"神奇的镐子",Lore:["它可以用来刨土","2333........."]},HideFlags:11,AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:8679826,UUIDMost:8679826,Amount:100000.0,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Damage},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:6736211,UUIDMost:6736211,Amount:0.01,AttributeName:generic.knockbackResistance,Name:K_Resistance},{Operation:1,UUIDLeast:8389199,UUIDMost:8389199,Amount:100,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Damage},{Operation:1,UUIDLeast:7838802,UUIDMost:7838802,Amount:1,AttributeName:generic.knockbackResistance,Name:K_Resistance},{Operation:1,UUIDLeast:639286,UUIDMost:639286,Amount:2,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health}],ench:[{id:33,lvl:1},{id:32,lvl:10},{id:21,lvl:10},{id:20,lvl:10},{id:19,lvl:10},{id:18,lvl:10},{id:17,lvl:10}],RepairCost:-1,CanDestroy:["stone","grass","log","dirt","sand","ice","snow","pumpkin","cactus","gravel"]}},CustomName:"『神奇的镐子』",CustomNameVisible:true,PickupDelay:250,Age:-32768}复制代码


望采纳

replies.author: 雾晨丶破晓
replies.txt_content:
放地上就
/setblock ~ ~ ~ 物品ID
在站的地方放置

replies.author: 雾晨丶破晓
replies.txt_content:
物品setblock
summon是生成生物用的
如/setblock ~ ~2 ~ 1
在头上放置一个石头

replies.author: Dear丶小若
replies.txt_content:
雾晨丶破晓 发表于 2016-7-14 16:33
物品setblock
summon是生成生物用的
如/setblock ~ ~2 ~ 1
........... 不是放方块 setblock 这个我知道啊 是生成一个物品掉在地上

replies.author: 雾晨丶破晓
replies.txt_content:
好像是可以.。。
/summon Item x y z {Id:物品ID,Count:1}

replies.author: Dear丶小若
replies.txt_content:
雾晨丶破晓 发表于 2016-7-14 16:49
好像是可以.。。
/summon Item x y z {Id:物品ID,Count:1}
count是数量？

replies.author: 雾晨丶破晓
replies.txt_content:
Dear丶小若 发表于 2016-7-14 17:27
count是数量？
是的

replies.author: Dear丶小若
replies.txt_content:
雾晨丶破晓 发表于 2016-7-14 17:33
1.7以上..1.8的把ID改为名称
1.7id 1.8英文是不是？
/summon 要生成物品的id 坐标

replies.author: LBL_CB
replies.txt_content:
/summon Item ~ ~1 ~ {Item:{id:<英文ID>,Count:1,Damage:0}}复制代码
Count是数量
Damage是参数（损坏值）

replies.author: Sssss...
replies.txt_content:
/summon item{Name=物品名称（英文）} ~ ~ ~复制代码
在站着的地方放置，1.8+
